subject: Sports Injuries
Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: In the 12th inning of Game 4 of the Yankees’ division series, a piece of Matt Wieters’s bat hit Joba Chamberlain in the arm, forcing him from the game.
snippet: In the 12th inning of Game 4 of the Yankees’ division series, a piece of Matt Wieters’s bat hit Joba Chamberlain in the arm, forcing him from the game.
